title: Defense Actions Ready Kit
description: A Ready Kit designed to help you through a life threatening situation by preparing you before, during and after the experience. What to do about bail bond, choosing an attorney, recording details, calling it in to the police, having a Power of Attorney ready, and more. Knowing these things before anything happens, having access to the information during and after the situation is critical to your proper survival. Its all ready for your comsuption.
author: Damon Thueson
